disease: Merkel cell carcinoma of left ear and external auricular canal

symptoms.name: Skin growth
symptoms.pattern: Most often appears as a bump on the face, head, or neck; can occur anywhere on the body, especially sun-exposed skin

symptoms.name: Change in size, shape, or color of mole, freckle, or bump
symptoms.pattern: May indicate progression of the carcinoma

physical_findings: Skin growth (nodule) on the left ear and external auricular canal
risk_factors: Less melanin in the skin (more common in white people)

required: Presence of a rapidly growing skin lesion
supportive: Histopathological examination confirming the presence of Merkel cell carcinoma cells
Imaging studies to assess the extent of the tumor and presence of metastasis
